tool_description: A scrapper / scraper API to get latest news every minute from more than 30 sources all over the world as a start ( sources will be increased with time to be hundreds of different sources of live news )
name: Moka News
title: Moka News

api_list.name: Sources List (New)
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get the list of all source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://moka-news.p.rapidapi.com/sources.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moka-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://moka-news.p.rapidapi.com/sources.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moka-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Filter { By Category & Source }  (New)
api_list.description:
Use this endpoint to get the recent 50 news items from a specific category from Categories
list & a specific source from Sources list.

api_list.name: By Source (New)
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to get the recent 50 news items from a specific source from Sources list

api_list.name: Recent 100
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moka-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: by Category
api_list.description: get the recent 50 news by category , EX :   Sport , World  .... etc

api_list.name: categories
api_list.description: get the list of Moka News categories ( important if you want later to get data related to a specific category).
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "moka-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())
